ACME_DOMAIN.description: The domains, separated by a comma you wish to generate the certificate for

ACME_APP_NAME.description: The heroku app you wish to add the certificate to

HEROKU_TOKEN.description: An heroku access token allowed to write config vars and SSL certificates on ACME_APP_NAME

RESTART_WAIT_TIME.description: Seconds to wait for ACME_APP_NAME to restart before completing verification. Long restarts will lead to H12 errors for your app but this may be useful to adjust when using preboot.
